resources.string: The HDRS (also known as the Ham-D) is to be administered by a health care professional.
/* This report is auto generated by the our App on the basis of your given information and problems. */
This depression inventory can be self-scored. The scoring scale is at the end of the questionnaire.

Depression, stress and Anxiety is serious mental health problem. It needs to be treated on time because Untreated depression increases the chance of risky behaviors such as drug or alcohol addiction etc. It also can ruin relationships, cause problems at work, and make it difficult to overcome serious illnesses. Doctors helps us to fight these kind of problems through their suggestions and treatments.
Depression is different from regular mood changes and feelings about everyday life. The best way to treat by involving yourself in the task or activities.
